page.title: 04BURSTOW SCHOOL
page.content: {Burstow County First and Middle {School}is sited in Wheelers Lane. Until 12 years ago it was housed in a Victorian building in Redehall Road. Children between 5-12 years come to the school from Burstow,Outwood, Horne and Newchapel. Children living more than 3 miles away may travel on the school coach. There are 12 classes of about 30 children with a Headmaster, Deputy and staff of 12. The school day is from 9am. to 3.20pm.Children may eat school lunches (63p per day), sandwiches or go home. Subjects taught are Mathematics, Art,English, Science, Religious Education, Social Studies, Music, French, Crafts and Sport. Children have homework from the age of 10. Several times a year classes go on educational visits. The Parent Teacher Association organises social and fund-raising events each year.
